page.title: 04Fishing on the Tay.Page 1.
page.content: An interview with Mr.and Mrs Campbell. {1) Do you fish yourself and what is {the largest fish you have caught? I fish nowadays for salmon,salmon trout and brown trout.The largest fresh water fish I have caught has been a 32lb.salmon taken from the Aberfeldy beat.This is a record from that particular beat,beating the previous best fish that was 27lbs. {2> Where do the fishermen come from? The fishermen are mainly visitors to the area.These people have either fished this area before or are people who have heard of the famous Tay Salmon.Very few local people fish my beats because of the cost. {3> What are the duties of a Ghillie?} He is a person who knows every rock or resting place of fish on a particular beat.He looks after and cleans his appointed area. <continued> {
